import AdminSidebar from "../../adminSideBar/AdminSidebar" import { useGetSingleProductQuery } from "../../../../features/productApi" import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import '/productDetails.css' const ProductDetails = ()=>{ const { productId } = useParams() const {data,error,isLoading} = useGetSingleProductQuery(productId) console.log(data) return (
name {data && data.data.name}
{data &&}
) } export default ProductDetails
